Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays near Jackson due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays near Jackson due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
